name: Side Effect (itch)
description:
/!\ This game was created during a Game Jam and its development was suspended /!\

Objective :

Hi, 

in this game you play like a divinity. Your role  add new resources/forest on the map to influence the evolution of people who live in.

Each action you make have side effect so make change carefully.

Commands :

WASD - to move camera

Mouse Wheel - Zoom

M - show iron heap

P - Quit game and back to main menu

If you have proposals or ideas of improvements you can let it to us know by leaving us a comment, you can also contact us by e-mail has this address : marcelsgamesstudio@gmail.com
